root.name: Art Style: AQUIA
root.description: Art style: AQUIA is a block puzzle game for the Nintendo DSi released in the states on April 5, 2009 as one title on a small list of DSiWare launch titles.PricingJapan, Dec. 24, 2008: 500 pointsUnited States: 500 pointsEurope, April. 03, 2009: 500 points
